author: TravisEz13
body:
FYI @joeyaiello 

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
Get-AuthenticodeSignature -FilePath '\Program Files\PowerShell\Modules\Pester\Pester.psd1' | fl * -force
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
SignerCertificate      :
TimeStamperCertificate :
Status                 : NotSigned
StatusMessage          : The file C:\Program Files\PowerShell\Modules\Pester\Pester.psd1 is not
                         digitally signed. You cannot run this script on the current system. For more information
                         about running scripts and setting execution policy, see about_Execution_Policies at
                         http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=135170
Path                   : C:\Program Files\PowerShell\Modules\Pester\Pester.psd1
SignatureType          : None
IsOSBinary             : False
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
SignerCertificate      :
TimeStamperCertificate :
Status                 : UnknownError
StatusMessage          : The form specified for the subject is not one supported or known by the specified trust
                         provider
Path                   : C:\Program Files\PowerShell\Modules\Pester\Pester.psd1
SignatureType          : None
IsOSBinary             : False
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.4
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16237
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Verified this is fix in the latest container

title: Get-AuthenticodeSignature fails on NanoServer-Insider
